us.title: Peter Schiff Warns of S&P 500 Bear Market and Inflation Impact, Bitcoin Struggles as Gold Soars in 2025
us.content: Bitcoin hit an all-time high of around $109,071 in January. However, it has since dropped nearly 25%, settling at about $80,000. This volatility has hit newer investors hardest, especially those who bought in during the peak.

us.title: LARRY KUDLOW: Did the so-called recession just end?
us.content: The left-wing media keeps pushing their narrative that tariffs are inflationary. But new numbers show the economy is on bouncing back

us.title: SCHG: The Gentle Giant May Have Upside Potential Amid Valuation Decline
us.content: SCHG, representing large-cap growth stocks, has seen valuation declines, with its P/E dropping from 25.19x to 22.12x, nearing historical medians. SCHG's competitive edge includes a low expense ratio (0.04%), strong performance, and lower concentration risk compared to peers. Assuming a justified P/E of 22.12 and 14.88% EPS growth, SCHG could see a 14% upside, barring significant earnings surprises.

us.title: Larry Kudlow: Did the recession just end?
us.content: FOX Business host Larry Kudlow discusses the Trump administration mitigating some recession fears on 'Kudlow.'

us.title: Bitcoin Vs. Gold: Schiff Predicts A Catastrophic 85% BTC Drop—Details
us.content: A well-known American economist suggested a relationship between gold, NASDAQ and Bitcoin, saying that a decline in NASDAQ usually leads to a decrease in Bitcoin. Peter Schiff explained in a post the correlation between the state of Bitcoin and the market situation of NASDAQ, adding that there is a negative relationship between gold and NASDAQ.

us.title: Strategy Plans to Use Funds from Preferred Stock Offering for Bitcoin Acquisitions
us.content: Strategy's recently made a Bitcoin purchase of 130 BTC for $10.7 million - its smallest acquisition since its first in 2020.

us.title: VIDEO - CEO Clips - Avino Silver & Gold Mines: Expanding Operations with a Strong Growth Vision
us.content: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - March 18, 2025) - Avino Silver & Gold Mines Ltd. (TSX: ASM) (NYSE American: ASM) - A debt-free, cash-flow positive precious metals producer, Avino is driving growth with a strategic plan to achieve intermediate producer status within five years.

us.title: Market wants some assurance Fed will be flexible with policy, says Bessemer's Jeff Mills
us.content: Jeff Mills, Bessemer Trust Chief Investment Strategist, joins 'Fast Money' to talk what to expect from Wednesday's Fed decision.

us.title: When to actually expect the Fed to cut interest rates
us.content: Federal Reserve officials likely to hold interest rates steady at March meeting.

us.title: AiXBT agent scammed into sending 55.50 ETH to malicious account, token falls 20%
us.content: AiXBT, a popular AI-driven crypto market commentator, fell victim to a security breach on Mar. 18, resulting in a loss of 55.50 ETH or approximately $104,000.

us.title: INVESTIGATION ALERT: Edelson Lechtzin LLP Announces Investigation of Hesai Group (NASDAQ: HSAI) and Urges Investors with Substantial Losses to Contact the Firm
us.content: NEWTOWN, Pa. , March 18, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Edelson Lechtzin LLP is investigating potential violations of the federal securities laws involving Hesai Group (NASDAQ: HSAI) resulting from allegations of providing potentially misleading business information to the investing public.

us.title: Bank of Japan keeps rates steady as Trump tariffs cast a shadow over economic outlook
us.content: Japan's central bank kept its key policy rate steady at 0.5% at Wednesday's conclusion of a two-day meeting. The move, which was in line with market expectations, comes as the Bank of Japan assesses the potential impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's protectionist trade policies on its export-reliant economy.

us.title: Consumer side seeing significant worry about business conditions deteriorating: Apollo's Slok
us.content: Torsten Slok, Apollo Global Management chief economist, joins 'Closing Bell Overtime' to talk the state of the U.S. economy.

us.title: ICSH: A Solid 'Dry Powder' Cash ETF
us.content: The iShares Ultra Short-Term Bond Active ETF offers income by investing in short-term debt securities and money market instruments. ICSH's low duration makes it a suitable cash park, outperforming other funds like the iShares 0-3 Month Treasury Bond ETF. ICSH has shown impressive performance, even surpassing newer ETFs targeting a six-month duration, despite the slight risk increase during dramatic rate changes in 2022-2023.

france.title: Trump policies 'promise' an economic downturn, says prominent forecaster in first-ever 'recession watch'
france.content: The UCLA Anderson Forecast, citing substantial changes to the economy from policies of the Trump administration, issued its first-ever "recession watch" on Tuesday.

france.title: Will Shiba Inu Price Decline Continue As ‘Death Cross' Pattern Emerges?
france.content: Shiba Inu (SHIB) has been on a downward trend in recent weeks, with its price dropping by over 34% since February. This latest movement has drawn some attention amongst investors, mainly because the token is approaching a support level.

france.title: The Fed's Wait-and-See Outlook Obscures a Bigger Strategy Shift
france.content: Central banks can lower rates because of good or bad news. The window for ‘good' cuts is closing due to new inflation risks.

france.title: Getty Images Rises on Strong Q4 Earnings, But 2025 Outlook Disappoints
france.content:
Getty Images Holdings (NYSE:GETY) saw its shares rise over 1% intra-day today after delivering better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings, fueled by robust editorial revenue growth and higher annual subscription contributions. However, guidance for 2025 fell short of analyst expectations, tempering some of the enthusiasm.

The company reported adjusted earnings per share of $0.06, beating forecasts of $0.05, while revenue rose 9.5% year-over-year to $247.3 million, surpassing the expected $245.49 million.

Editorial revenue emerged as a standout performer, surging 19% year-over-year to $90.1 million. Additionally, annual subscription revenue accounted for 54.9% of total sales, up from 53.8% in the same quarter last year, signaling strong customer retention and recurring revenue expansion.

Despite the solid quarterly results, Getty’s full-year 2025 revenue projection of $918-$955 million fell short of the $958.7 million consensus estimate, raising some concerns about future growth momentum.

Net income for the quarter stood at $24.7 million, a decline from $39.1 million in Q4 2023, though results were impacted by a $45.9 million foreign exchange gain tied to its Euro Term Loan.

For the full year 2024, revenue increased 2.5% to $939.3 million, with net income nearly doubling to $39.5 million from $19.6 million in 2023.

france.title: Bitcoin Whales Are Back—Could This Be the Catalyst for the Next Rally?
france.content: Bitcoin (BTC) continues to trade below the psychological $90,000 level, with its price standing at $82,346. This marks a 24.3% drop from its all-time high above $109,000 recorded in January.

france.title: Nvidia CEO says power-saving optical chip tech will need to wait for wider use
france.content: A promising new chip technology that aims to cut energy usage is not yet reliable enough for use in Nvidia's flagship graphics processing units (GPUs), Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang said Tuesday.
